reviews.author: Arvind S
reviews.text: This is my second time visiting this place. It's beautiful and very peaceful since I had gone on a weekday afternoon. The food is OK, I tried a chicken pizza and it felt very bland. I'm a person who never takes any oregano or chilli â€¦

reviews.author: sonali kotian
reviews.text:
This is a cool, chill place to vibe with friends and snack on something tasty.
The customer service is top-notch. While seating may take some time on weekends, the wait is well worth it. â€¦

reviews.author: Akshat Bhatia
reviews.text: This restaurant offers a beautiful and serene dining experience, making you feel like youâ€™re enjoying a meal in a treehouse. The ambiance is peaceful, and the setting is perfect for a relaxed meal. â€¦

name: The Hole In The Wall Cafe

reviews.author: Ajzab C Sulfikar
reviews.text:
One of my favorite breakfast places in Bangalore!

Tried the Farmerâ€™s Breakfast, English Breakfast, and the Beef Burger â€” and â€¦

reviews.author: Ehra Khan
reviews.text: Love the vibe of the place. Service was a little slow. I was not a fan of the coffees. However the breakfast was delicious. We ordered A Chicken special and churro pancakes. They were delectable and filling. Savoured every last bite of it. I really enjoyed the atmosphere. It was bustling but warm and comfortable.

reviews.author: Ajesh Joseph
reviews.text:
Fantastic Breakfast Spot!
This cafe is a winner for breakfast. The huge selection of meat and burgers is a highlight, and the ambience is excellent, thanks to the beautifully decorated â€¦

reviews.author: alexjoyluke
reviews.text: This place is located in an iconic spot with a fantastic ambiance, especially the outdoor coffee seating, which is excellent. We tried the blueberry cake and coffee. The blueberry cake was delicious and well-made, definitely worth trying. â€¦

reviews.author: sally josephine
reviews.text:
Such a classic place on church street.
There is indoor and outdoor seating as well.
Service is quite basic. â€¦

reviews.author: V G Subramanian
reviews.text: Matteo Coffea is a lively bustling Cafe located along the Brigade Road/Church Street in the heart of the Bengaluru city. They serve delicious American fast food including Pasta, Salads, Burgers, varieties of tea, Coffee, Pastries, Cakes, â€¦

reviews.author: Madhu Shalini
reviews.text: Recently visited a cafe in Bangalore with my friend, and it turned out to be such a great experience! We ordered pizza, soup, and noodles â€” all purely vegetarian, and everything tasted really good. The place has a really cool vibe, with an â€¦

reviews.author: Keerthi patil
reviews.text: There were some dishes on thr menu that I hvnt heard of or tried anywhere else but they were delicious. We got the crsipy baby corn sticks which were served in a martini glass with this hot chilli sauce and was honestly a delectable â€¦

reviews.author: Vasanthi Nagam
reviews.text:
Had been here for lunch with friends,  great place to hang out,  nice ambience & tasty food too.
Tried many veg starters along with Veg & Mushroom biryani.
Everything tasted awesome.

reviews.author: Prakash Sodha
reviews.text: Had recently visited  Azzure cafe with friends and yes fell in for this lovely ambience here. Ordered quite a few dishes and they were all nice but felt that was for a kids palate ðŸ˜…ðŸ˜… before we could feel the taste the food was all over from â€¦

reviews.author: Jyotsna Das
reviews.text: I celebrated my bride-to-be moments here. The ambience is cool, you can hang out with your friends/colleagues. The service is a little slow because of less waiters. The food was good.

reviews.author: Umer Moin Azeez
reviews.text: Back in 2022, this place used to be good, the ambience was nice, they served hookah as well as nice mocktails, and the food was also good. â€¦
